document_data.name: Mei Kuei Chu
document_data.mainbody: '''Mei Kuei Chu''' was a [[bamboo spirit folk]] [[samurai]] in [[Shou Lung]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Mei Kuei was set on a quest to preserve her clan's honor: three generations previously, a [[human]] burned a sacred bamboo grove, killing her aunt, and her uncle killed the man in retribution. The local magistrate condemned all the Chu clan, and they ran away. Mei Kuei worked to prove her aunt was actually murdered and show the charges against her uncle were unjust.
document_data.Personality: Mei Kuei was focused on her mission.
